title: Single Storied House In Mount Lavinia
location: 1st Cross Lane off Templers Road, Mount Lavinia
details:
Great Investment
Just 9km away from busy colombo
With all facilities one can enjoy with Colombo facility with superb calm environment.
With all reputed banks, schools, restaurants, hotels, medicine clinics, fashion houses, and many more...
Wide roadways, access to galle road in minutes, high-level in 10-15minutes,famous beach is walking distance with many beach restaurants for relaxation.

House
2-3 years
3room/3bath
Single story
Spacious living
Pantry and kitchen
Double parking
Parapet wall around
Wooden finished ceiling(balaw and lunumidella)
Front and back garden.

NO BROKERS
